mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJ_SEQ as "seq", PROJ_TITLE as "title", PROJ_SUBTITLE as "subtitle", PROJ_DESC as "desc", PROJ_CONTENTS as "contents", PROJ_THUMB as "thumbnail", PROJ_SOURCECD as "sourcecode", PROJ_DEVELOPER as "developer", PROJ_HITS as "hits", PROJ_ENABLED as "enabled", count(B.COMT_SEQ) as 'comtCnt' FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT_COMT B ON A.PROJ_SEQ = B.PROJ_SEQ WHERE A.PROJ_SEQ = #{seq} GROUP BY A.PROJ_SEQ

SELECT A.PROJ_SEQ as "seq", PROJ_TITLE as "title", PROJ_SUBTITLE as "subtitle", PROJ_DESC as "desc", PROJ_CONTENTS as "contents", PROJ_THUMB as "thumbnail", PROJ_SOURCECD as "sourcecode", PROJ_DEVELOPER as "developer", PROJ_HITS as "hits", PROJ_ENABLED as "enabled", count(B.COMT_SEQ) as 'comtCnt' FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT_COMT B ON A.PROJ_SEQ = B.PROJ_SEQ WHERE A.PROJ_SEQ > #{seq} GROUP BY A.PROJ_SEQ ORDER BY A.PROJ_SEQ ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT A.PROJ_SEQ as "seq", PROJ_TITLE as "title", PROJ_SUBTITLE as "subtitle", PROJ_DESC as "desc", PROJ_CONTENTS as "contents", PROJ_THUMB as "thumbnail", PROJ_SOURCECD as "sourcecode", PROJ_DEVELOPER as "developer", PROJ_HITS as "hits", PROJ_ENABLED as "enabled", count(B.COMT_SEQ) as 'comtCnt' FROM TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT_COMT B ON A.PROJ_SEQ = B.PROJ_SEQ WHERE A.PROJ_SEQ < #{seq} GROUP BY A.PROJ_SEQ ORDER BY A.PROJ_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT (PROJ_TITLE, PROJ_SUBTITLE, PROJ_DESC, PROJ_CONTENTS, PROJ_THUMB, PROJ_SOURCECD, PROJ_DEVELOPER, PROJ_HITS, PROJ_ENABLED) VALUES (#{title}, #{subtitle}, #{desc}, #{contents}, #{thumbnail}, #{sourcecode},#{developer}, #{hits}, #{enabled})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CHANGOOS_PROJECT SET PROJ_TITLE = #{title}, PROJ_SUBTITLE = #{subtitle}, PROJ_DESC = #{desc}, PROJ_CONTENTS = #{contents}, PROJ_THUMB = #{thumbnail}, PROJ_SOURCECD = #{sourcecode}, PROJ_DEVELOPER = #{developer}, PROJ_HITS = #{hits}, PROJ_ENABLED = #{enabled} WHERE PROJ_SEQ = #{seq}
